t: You can now buy Canyon bikes on Amazon in the US as German brand becomes the first major bike manufacturer to list on the platform | Cyclingnews
s: May 2, 2025 - American buyers can now buy a Canyon mountain bike, urban bike or electric bike on Amazon, will road and gravel bikes follow?

t: A major bike brand is now selling on Amazon
s: May 1, 2025 - Direct to consumer bike brand Canyon has long offered bikes for sale via their own website. Now, buyers in the US can purchase many popular Canyon bikes on Amazon.

t: Canyon is now selling bikes on Amazon – but only a select few models | BikeRadar
s: May 2, 2025 - US consumers can now buy Canyon bikes via Amazon. The German direct-to-consumer bike brand has listed a selection of urban, recreational and mountain bikes.

t: Buying a Bike on Amazon: Pros and Cons - Where The Road Forks
s: January 9, 2024 - In terms of quality, the average Amazon bike is generally below what you would find at a bike shop and above what you would find in a big box store like Walmart. Average prices range from around $300-$500. At this price point, you’ll get a decent bike equipped with name-brand components.

t: Canyon selling some bikes through Amazon | Bicycle Retailer and Industry News
